GetClassType.name: GetClassType
GetClassType.description: Returns the type of the ApiTableRow class.

GetCellsCount.name: GetCellsCount
GetCellsCount.description: Returns a number of cells in the current row.

GetCell.name: GetCell
GetCell.description: Returns a cell by its position in the current row.

params.name: nPos
params.description: The cell position in the table row.

SetHeight.name: SetHeight
SetHeight.description: Sets the height to the current table row.

params.name: nValue
params.description: The row height in English measure units.

comment:
